title: Adventure a state of mind
description:
O’Neill team rider Damien Castera is a versatile person. Shifting from longboards to shortboards, from one to four fins, one day hiking and fishing in the mountains, the next riding barrels. For him life is an adventure and adventure is life. 
Always trying to step out his comfort zone Damien takes advantage of all conditions and makes sure every new day is unpredictable.
If you look for it adventure can be found everywhere…

Filmers: 
Yannick Loussouarn
Falling Angels prod
Damien Castera

Edit: Falling Angels prod

Music: 
band:1860-song: Mannhafið
band: Pontiacs-song: Voices
